text: Patrick Bascio (born 1927) is an author and Roman Catholic priest. He is a professor at Salve Regina University in Rhode Island. == Bibliography == * Building a Just Society: A Different Viewpoint, Orbis Books, 1981. * Failure of White Theology: A Black Theological Perspective, Lang, 1994. * Pedophilia Cancer Within, Branden Books, 2010 * The Immorality of Illegal Immigration: An Alternative Christian View, American Free Press, 2009 * Defeating Islamic Terrorism — The Wahhabi Factor, Branden Books, 2006 ==References== Category:1927 births Category:American Roman Catholic priests Category:American anti–illegal immigration activists Category:Living people
